testcase.name: Create User API test scenario
testcase.system-out: Given Create user payload "nikhil","patil@tipai","male","active"............passed When User calls user API using post method..................................passed Then The "post" API call got success with status code 201...................passed

testcase.name: Delete User API test scenario
